subject: Real Estate and property L
body:
Real Estate and property Lawyer
Office 51 avenue BP 002 Parakou
Tel: 00229-908 987 28
Greeting my dear  
Honestly i am glade that you respond to my overture, indeed you have
spoken well and i must divulge to you that your outlined message is
well understood.
Honestly my primary and secondary reason for contacting you with this
proposal is for we to excel and not with any negative thought. I knew
it will be very grueling for you to accept fully with what it takes to
start and complete this transaction with me due to your past
experience.
Indeed this is a transaction that involved high enormity of fund and
as a result, it will require a lot of process to see this transaction
out-and-out. I seek for your permission for partnership, therefore i
will appreciate it so much and it will help us if you will partner
with me with full confident.
In a partnership of this class, both of us are expected to contribute
financially and time but one end must be high in expense based on the
ratio as i stated in my proposal. If there is an oat or guarantee you
need from me to confirm the legality and sincerity of this transaction
i will provide it to you because i sincerely want to start and
complete this transaction with you, therefore i deeply demand for your
trust.
Thank you and be bless and save
Bar: Denis P. Bowen (Esq.)

subject: Re:     Real Estate and property L
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate your honesty and sincerity in this matter. However, before we proceed further, I would like to know more details about the proposal you mentioned. 

Could you please provide me with more information about the nature of this project? What kind of investment are we talking about? And what would be my role and responsibilities in this?

I am open to new opportunities but I believe it's crucial to understand all aspects of a project before making any commitments.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Tracy
